Text: how about releasing 2 versions, one in 1080 SBS and one in the just for Nintendo format - please

You can find them @ YouTube:
Search for "3D Stereoscopic Movie of Fireworks Display" and "Fireworks Symphony"
I removed the intro logo and the credits at the end (saves some space on your SD card)
+ I've lowered the brightness a bit and converted it to a 3DS movie
